recipes.name: Old Fashioned
recipes.instructions: Stir ingredients with ice. Strain over fresh ice. Garnish with orange.

recipes.name: Dry Martini
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish with olive.

recipes.name: Daiquiri
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Fine strain.

recipes.name: Margarita
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into salt-rimmed glass.

recipes.name: Whisky Sour
recipes.instructions: Dry shake (no ice) first, then shake with ice. Strain over fresh ice.

recipes.name: Espresso Martini
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice to create foam. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Negroni
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Manhattan
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Mojito
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint gently. Add ingredients and ice. Top with soda.

recipes.name: Moscow Mule
recipes.instructions: Build in mug over ice. Top with Ginger Beer.

recipes.name: Aperol Spritz
recipes.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Prosecco, then Aperol, then Soda.

recipes.name: Bloody Mary
recipes.instructions: Stir gently with ice. Garnish with celery stick.

recipes.name: Cosmopolitan
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Tom Collins
recipes.instructions: Shake (except soda). Strain onto ice. Top with soda.

recipes.name: Mai Tai
recipes.instructions: Shake hard. Pour unstrained into glass.

recipes.name: Piña Colada
recipes.instructions: Shake hard or blend with crushed ice.

recipes.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

recipes.name: Caipirinha
recipes.instructions: Muddle lime chunks and sugar. Add ice and Cachaça. Stir.

recipes.name: Gin Fizz
recipes.instructions: Shake (no soda). Strain into glass (no ice). Top with soda.

recipes.name: White Russian
recipes.instructions: Build vodka and liqueur over ice. Float cream on top.

recipes.name: Bellini
recipes.instructions: Pour puree into glass. Top gently with Prosecco.

recipes.name: French 75
recipes.instructions: Shake first 3 ingredients. Strain into flute. Top with Champagne.

recipes.name: Gimlet
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Paloma
recipes.instructions: Build in glass with ice. Stir.

recipes.name: Mint Julep
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint gently. Fill cup with crushed ice. Add bourbon. Stir until cup frosts.

recipes.name: Tequila Sunrise
recipes.instructions: Build tequila and juice. Sink grenadine to bottom.

recipes.name: Long Island Iced Tea
recipes.instructions: Shake all spirits/sour. Strain into ice-filled glass. Top with Cola.

recipes.name: Cuba Libre
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

recipes.name: Shirley Temple
recipes.instructions: Build over ice. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Virgin Colada
recipes.instructions: Shake hard or blend with crushed ice.

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Bronx
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Bamboo
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Sherry Flip
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Champagne Cocktail
recipes.instructions: Soak sugar cube in bitters. Drop into flute. Top with Champagne.

recipes.name: Black Velvet
recipes.instructions: Fill half with Champagne, top with Guinness.

recipes.name: Prince of Wales
recipes.instructions: Build in glass (or silver cup). Top with Champagne.

recipes.name: Pick Me Up
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Champagne). Strain into flute. Top with Champagne.

recipes.name: White Lady
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Paradise
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Pink Lady
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Gin Alexander
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
recipes.instructions: Shake (except soda). Strain into glass. Top with soda.

recipes.name: Pink Sling
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into ice-filled glass.

recipes.name: Red Lion
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Harvey Wallbanger
recipes.instructions: Build vodka and juice over ice. Float Galliano on top.

recipes.name: Swimming Pool
recipes.instructions: Shake hard or blend. Pour into glass over crushed ice.

recipes.name: Blue Lagoon
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Top with Ginger Ale or Lemonade.

recipes.name: Salty Dog
recipes.instructions: Rim glass with salt. Build ingredients over ice.

recipes.name: Screwdriver
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice.

recipes.name: Chi-Chi
recipes.instructions: Blend with crushed ice.

recipes.name: El Presidente
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Scorpion
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Pour into large glass.

recipes.name: Zombie
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Pour unstrained into large glass.

recipes.name: Blue Hawaii
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Rum Alexander
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: El Diabolo
recipes.instructions: Build over ice. Squeeze lime wedge. Top with Ginger Ale.

recipes.name: Mexican Sunset
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain over fresh ice.

recipes.name: B and B
recipes.instructions: Build in glass (or snifter). No ice.

recipes.name: Between the Sheets
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Brandy Alexander
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Sidecar
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into sugar-rimmed glass.

recipes.name: Brandy Eggnog
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Jack Rose
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Pisco Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain. Top with bitters.

recipes.name: Porto Flip
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain. Garnish with nutmeg.

recipes.name: A & A Ginger Ale
recipes.instructions: Pour liqueur into a glass with ice. Top with cold Ginger Ale. Garnish with white grapes.

recipes.name: Adria Look
recipes.instructions: Shake ingredients (except Sparkling Wine) with ice. Strain into a large glass. Top with Sparkling Wine. Garnish with apricot and cherry.

recipes.name: Adonis
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: After All
recipes.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Alfonso
recipes.instructions: Soak sugar cube in bitters in the glass. Add Dubonnet and one ice cube. Top with Champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Alligator
recipes.instructions: Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a glass with fresh ice. Garnish with lemon slice and cherry.

recipes.name: American Beauty
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Port) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Float Port on top.

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.instructions: Build in glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice or lemon twist.

recipes.name: Andalusia Cooler
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Bitter Lemon) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Top with Bitter Lemon.

recipes.name: Aperol Spritz
recipes.instructions: Fill glass with ice. Add Prosecco, then Aperol, then Soda. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Apple Bang
recipes.instructions: Pour Calvados over ice. Top with cold Cider. Garnish with apple wedge.

recipes.name: Apple Scotch
recipes.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with lemon slice and cherry.

recipes.name: Applecart
recipes.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Applejack
recipes.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Applejack Flip
recipes.instructions: Shake vigorously with ice. Strain. Dust with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Applejack Highball
recipes.instructions: Pour Calvados over ice. Top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with apple peel.

recipes.name: Applejack Punch
recipes.instructions: Build in glass with ice. Stir well. Top with Ginger Ale.

recipes.name: Apps with Pears
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass. Garnish with apple and pear slices.

recipes.name: Apricot Secco
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Arranco
recipes.instructions: Shake well with ice. Strain into a large tumbler with fresh ice. Garnish with strawberry.

recipes.name: Azzurro Bacio
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Sparkling Wine) with ice. Strain into large glass. Top with Sparkling Wine.

recipes.name: Bahama Mama
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a highball glass with ice. Garnish with star fruit and cherry.

recipes.name: Bamboo
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Banana Boat
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a large fancy glass with ice. Drizzle Grenadine on top. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

recipes.name: Banana Royal
recipes.instructions: Blend with ice. Pour into a fancy glass with ice. Garnish with fruits.

recipes.name: Barbara
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Batida Banana
recipes.instructions: Blend with ice. Pour into a glass over crushed ice. Garnish with banana slices.

recipes.name: Batida de Abacaxi
recipes.instructions: Quarter lime and squeeze into glass. Add lime pieces, syrup, juice, and Cachaça. Stir well with ice.

recipes.name: Batida de Maracuja con Limão
recipes.instructions: Quarter lime and squeeze into glass. Add lime pieces, Cachaça, and nectar. Stir with ice.

recipes.name: Batida de Mel
recipes.instructions: Squeeze limes into glass. Add pieces, Cachaça, and Lime Juice. Stir. Drizzle honey on top.

recipes.name: Beach Beauty
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Tonic) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Top with Tonic. Garnish with orange.

recipes.name: Bel Air
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with orange zest.

recipes.name: Bentley
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Berry Rosso
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with crushed ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

recipes.name: Betsy Rose
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Express orange zest over drink.

recipes.name: Betsy Ross
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Betty Blue
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Express orange zest over drink.

recipes.name: Big Apple
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a mini apple.

recipes.name: Big Ben
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Bitter Lemon) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with Bitter Lemon.

recipes.name: Bitter Pastis
recipes.instructions: Add Pastis, Vodka, and juice to a glass with ice. Stir. Top with Bitter Lemon.

recipes.name: Bitter-Orange
recipes.instructions: Pour Campari into a glass with ice. Top with Orange Juice. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Black Magic
recipes.instructions: Pour juice and Triple Sec into a flute. Top with Sparkling Wine.

recipes.name: Bloody Bull
recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with lemon slice.

recipes.name: Blow Up
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Sparkling Wine) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with Sparkling Wine.

recipes.name: Blue Dream
recipes.instructions: Pour Vodka and juice into a glass with ice. Float Blue Curaçao on top.

recipes.name: Blue Lady
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Blue Wind
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Tonic) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with Tonic.

recipes.name: Brandy Collins
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Soda) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with Soda.

recipes.name: Brandy Fino
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Express lemon zest over drink.

recipes.name: Brandy Fizz
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Soda) with ice. Strain into a glass (no ice). Top with Soda.

recipes.name: Brandy Flip
recipes.instructions: Shake vigorously with ice. Strain. Dust with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Brandy Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass. Garnish with orange and cherry.

recipes.name: Bueno Vista
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Express orange zest over drink.

recipes.name: Bull Shot
recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Stir well.

recipes.name: Cachaça Berry
recipes.instructions: Muddle berries in glass with crushed ice. Shake liquids with ice and strain into the glass. Garnish with berries.

recipes.name: Cachaça Laranja
recipes.instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir briefly. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Cachaça Maracuja
recipes.instructions: Pour into a glass with ice. Stir briefly. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Caipirinha Limão
recipes.instructions: Squeeze limes into glass. Add ingredients. Stir with crushed ice. Garnish with pineapple.

recipes.name: Caipirovka

recipes.name: Calvados Cocktail
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with apple piece.

recipes.name: Calvados Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake vigorously with ice. Strain. Garnish with orange and cherry.

recipes.name: Canarian
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with orange and cherry.

recipes.name: Caribbean
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Sparkling Wine) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Top with Sparkling Wine. Garnish with Kiwi.

recipes.name: Caribbean Mule
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Ginger Beer) with ice. Strain into mug with ice. Top with Ginger Beer.

recipes.name: Caribbean Shake
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with Mango.

recipes.name: Champagne Flip
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Champagne) vigorously with ice. Strain into glass. Top with Champagne. Dust with nutmeg.

recipes.name: Citrus Rum Cooler
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Lemonade) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Top with Lemonade.

recipes.name: City Life
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with crushed ice. Garnish with lime slice.

recipes.name: Claridge
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into chilled glass.

recipes.name: Costa de la Luz
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with pineapple.

recipes.name: Cranberry Punch
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Garnish with orange.

recipes.name: Creamy Orange
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Crushed Power
recipes.instructions: Muddle fruits with sugar. Add liquids. Fill with crushed ice and stir.

recipes.name: Crystal Waters
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Lemonade) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Top with Lemonade.

recipes.name: Cognac Summit

recipes.name: Daiquiri Blossom

recipes.name: Daiquiri on the rocks

recipes.name: Dandy
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express orange zest over drink.

recipes.name: Dark 'n' Stormy

recipes.name: Deauville
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Deborah

recipes.name: Dr. Funk

recipes.name: Dutch Trade
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Eagle's Dream
recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. (Very strong!)

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Shake hard with ice. Strain into a glass. Dust with nutmeg.

recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Top with Lemonade. Garnish with lemon.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Emerald

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Farmer's Choice
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

recipes.name: Fernet Branca Cocktail

recipes.name: Fifth Avenue

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Florida Cocktail

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Flying Kangaroo

recipes.instructions: Shake (except Sherry) with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Float Sherry on top.

recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with an apple slice.

recipes.name: French 75

recipes.name: French Martini
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

recipes.name: French Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with orange and cherry.

recipes.name: Frenchy
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with strawberry.

recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Top with Tonic. Garnish with lemon or lime.

recipes.name: Gin Buck
recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with lemon slice.

recipes.name: Gin Cobbler
recipes.instructions: Dissolve sugar in soda. Add Gin and crushed ice. Decorate with fruit.

recipes.name: Gin Daisy
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Soda) with ice. Strain into glass with ice. Top with Soda.

recipes.name: Gin Fix
recipes.instructions: Dissolve sugar in water/lemon juice. Add Gin. Fill with crushed ice. Stir.

recipes.name: Gin Rickey
recipes.instructions: Squeeze lime into glass and drop it in. Add ice and Gin. Top with Soda.

recipes.name: Gin Sling
recipes.instructions: Dissolve sugar in lemon/water. Add Gin and ice. Stir.

recipes.name: Gin Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a tumbler with fresh ice. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Gin Squirt
recipes.instructions: Shake (except carbonated) with ice. Strain into glass. Top with Bitter Lemon and Soda.

recipes.name: Gin Swizzle
recipes.instructions: Build in glass. Fill with crushed ice. 'Swizzle' (spin swizzle stick) until frosted.

recipes.name: Gipsy
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Girl's Best Friend
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Gloria
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Mulled Wine (Glühwein)
recipes.instructions: Heat ingredients together (do not boil). Remove spices. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Godfather
recipes.instructions: Build in a tumbler over ice. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Godmother
recipes.instructions: Build in a tumbler over ice. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Golden Cadillac
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Golden Dream
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Golden Fizz
recipes.instructions: Shake (except Soda) vigorously with ice. Strain into glass. Top with Soda.

recipes.name: Grand Slate
recipes.instructions: Stir with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Grapefruit Cocktail
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a sugar-rimmed glass.

recipes.name: Grasshopper
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. (Classic green dessert drink).

recipes.name: Green Devil
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a cherry.

recipes.name: Green Dragon
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass.

recipes.name: Green Eyes
recipes.instructions: Blend with crushed ice (becomes green). Pour into a fancy glass.

recipes.name: Greyhound
recipes.instructions: Build in a glass with ice. Stir.

recipes.name: Grog
recipes.instructions: Dissolve sugar in hot water. Add Rum. Stir.

recipes.name: Gypsy Queen
recipes.instructions: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Golden Slipper
recipes.instructions: Shake vigorously with ice. Strain.
